# Factorio Game Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Iron Chest at position (42.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5)
- Iron Chest at position (44.5, -80.5)
- Iron Chest at position (45.5, -80.5)
- Iron Chest at position (47.5, -80.5)
- Iron Chest at position (49.5, -80.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (41.5, -78.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Iron Chest at position (-18.5, -48.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-16.5, -48.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-15.5, -48.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-13.5, -49.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-12.5, -49.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-11.5, -49.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-10.5, -49.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-8.5, -49.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-9.5, -49.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-7.5, -48.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5)

### Iron Plate Storage Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (-11.5, -45.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-10.5, -45.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-12.5, -44.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-10.5, -44.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-8.5, -44.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Waiting for Items
- Multiple inserters at positions (-12.5, -44.5), (-10.5, -44.5), and (-8.5, -44.5) are waiting for items. Ensure that the upstream supply is sufficient to keep the inserters operational. Check the supply lines and ensure that resources are being transported efficiently to these inserters.

### Chest Full Warning
- The chests at drop positions for the mining drills are full. Ensure to regularly empty the chests at positions (41.5, -80.5) and (-14.5, -48.5) to continue mining operations without interruptions. Consider expanding storage capacity or increasing the frequency of resource collection.

### No Ingredients to Smelt
- Furnaces at positions (43.0, -82.0), (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), and (-9.0, -48.0) have warnings for no ingredients to smelt. Ensure that the supply of raw materials to these furnaces is consistent and sufficient to maintain production.
